summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 FORD F-150.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHEN THE TIRES ARE COLD, THE STEERING SHAKES.  THE STEERING OPERATES PROPERLY WHEN THE TIRES ARE WARM.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE FAILURE IS NORMAL DUE TO THE SOFT COMPOUND OF THE TIRE AND WOULD NOT MAKE ANY REPAIRS.  THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 19,000.
